name: OneMinute
description:
"This game was pretty neat, technically. The shadows and lighting were pretty cool..." - @JacobV

"The game where you have a really hectic morning, and for some reason must to do all routine tasks within a minute...The music is pretty cool, and radio was a nice touch as well." - @Alice

"I think this was very well made, and presented well..." - @Siolfor the Jackal

OneMinute is a game about Time Loops made for GMC JAM #3 in less than 72 hours. (actually, even less than 30 hours of actual coding and artwork.)

The idea is that you only have One Minute to finish all your tasks before leaving the house, if you do not succeed then you will Loop back in Time.

Sometimes what your character tells you is not the fastest route and you'll have to remember the objectives yourself and find a faster route!

There's also a pure maze in there (level #4) for those that don't like remembering objectives and path-finding.

Movement with WASD. (There is also mouse-only movement setting in options!)

Left mouse click for select.

ALT-ENTER or check options for FULL SCREEN!

Let me know what you think; much love, Lemth.
